page.title: 14MY HOME
page.content: I live in a semi-detached house which is fairly near a park and a river. The house is very old and the only house of its kind which has four bay windows. We were told when we bought the house that it was the show house of the street. We have finally started the decorating and we are trying to restore to its natural look, with oak doors and repairing the leaded light windows. The front garden is fairly small with a hedge surounding it and a large tree in the middle. We have a large garage with a side entrance which leads to the back door and back garden. The back garden is very big with a greenhouse, two sheds,a double swing with see-saw and a rabbit hutch and run in it. The house has eight rooms altogether with three bedrooms and a play room. The kitchen has been extended and is now a reasonable size.
